abstract: Women's apparel retailer Talbots announces that it expects first-quarter sales to fall from the year-earlier period, setting off a 14.7 percent decline in its share price.
lead_paragraph: The prediction set off a 14.7 percent decline in the company’s share price on Friday.

headline.main: Talbots Forecasts a Decline in First-Quarter Sales
